org.apache.flink.client

Class LocalExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.PlanExecutor
      • org.apache.flink.client.LocalExecutor

  • public class LocalExecutor
extends PlanExecutor
    A class for executing a Plan on a local embedded Flink runtime instance.

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Stop the local executor instance. You should not call executePlan after this.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • executePlan

        public JobExecutionResult executePlan(Plan plan)
                               throws Exception
        Execute the given plan on the local Nephele instance, wait for the job to finish and return the runtime in milliseconds.
        Specified by:
        executePlan in class PlanExecutor
        Parameters:
        plan - The plan of the program to execute.
        Returns:
        The net runtime of the program, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown, if either the startup of the local execution context, or the execution caused an exception.

      • getOptimizerPlanAsJSON

        public String getOptimizerPlanAsJSON(Plan plan)
                              throws Exception
        Returns a JSON dump of the optimized plan.
        Specified by:
        getOptimizerPlanAsJSON in class PlanExecutor
        Parameters:
        plan - The program's plan.
        Returns:
        JSON dump of the optimized plan.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • execute

        public static JobExecutionResult execute(Program pa,
                                         String... args)
                                  throws Exception
        Executes the program described by the given plan assembler.
        Parameters:
        pa - The program's plan assembler.
        args - The parameters.
        Returns:
        The net runtime of the program, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown, if either the startup of the local execution context, or the execution caused an exception.

      • execute

        public static JobExecutionResult execute(Plan plan)
                                  throws Exception
        Executes the program represented by the given Pact plan.
        Parameters:
        plan - The program's plan.
        Returns:
        The net runtime of the program, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown, if either the startup of the local execution context, or the execution caused an exception.

      • setLoggingLevel

      • setOverwriteFilesByDefault

        public static void setOverwriteFilesByDefault(boolean overwriteByDefault)
        By default, local environments do not overwrite existing files. NOTE: This method must be called prior to initializing the LocalExecutor or a LocalEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        overwriteByDefault - True to overwrite by default, false to not overwrite by default.
